${modID}:PowerRush.NAME: Power Rush
${modID}:PowerRush.DESCRIPTION: Return a Power from your discard pile to your hand. NL If you do, gain [E] .

${modID}:ManipulateSpace.NAME: Manipulate Space
${modID}:ManipulateSpace.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust your hand. NL You may put cards from your exhaust pile into your hand for each card Exhausted.

${modID}:WarpReality.NAME: Warp Reality
${modID}:WarpReality.DESCRIPTION: Add a chosen card to your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn and has Exhaust.

${modID}:BefuddleMind.NAME: Befuddle Mind
${modID}:BefuddleMind.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy is stunned and is damaged for their attack intent amount.

${modID}:RewindTime.NAME: Rewind Time
${modID}:RewindTime.DESCRIPTION: Return the top 5 cards in your discard pile to your hand. NL They cost 1 this turn.
